Text:
Didn't work for me in XP.
Thanks anyway.
You might have to make some adjustments in the settings, although, it works perfect for me.
Put it in a root-folder or a folder with maximum 8 characters. Might need compatability mode too. Works fine though, thanks :)

It will work for some, others will not be satisfied, but, that's life!

P.S I was surprised when i got it fully working on my computer without any adjustments at all. D.S
